title: Free to Play
synopsis: This documentary follows three professional video game players as they compete in an international tournament with a million-dollar prize.

title: Thammudu
synopsis: The banished son of a respectable family gets the chance to redeem himself when he takes his injured brother's place in a kickboxing tournament.

title: When We Were Kings
synopsis: In this Oscar-winning documentary, Muhammad Ali and George Foreman travel to Zaire for the 1974 "Rumble in the Jungle" heavyweight title bout.

title: The Notebook
synopsis: Two young lovers are torn apart by war and class differences in the 1940s in this adaptation of Nicholas Sparks's best-selling novel.

title: American Gangster
synopsis: Denzel Washington stars as true-life Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas and Russell Crowe plays the outcast NYPD cop charged with bringing him down.

title: 30 for 30: Pony Excess
synopsis: The glory days of Southern Methodist University's football program ended with the discovery of illegal recruiting violations.

title: Rock On!!
synopsis: Four friends hoped that their rock band would be a hit. After breaking up, the band members reunite and take another shot at fulfilling their dream.

title: Sergio
synopsis: This moving documentary profiles Sergio Viera de Mello, the charismatic U.N. High Commissioner of Human Rights, who was killed by terrorists in Iraq.

title: The Man from Nowhere
synopsis: Tae-Sik is a widower with a mysterious past. When a young girl he befriends is kidnapped by a vicious drug gang, Tae-Sik rushes to save her.

title: Captain Phillips
synopsis: In this exciting adventure based on true events, Tom Hanks portrays a captain who is taken hostage by Somali pirates after they hijack his cargo ship.

title: Glengarry Glen Ross
synopsis: Jack Lemmon, Al Pacino, Ed Harris and Alan Arkin star as Chicago real estate salesmen vying for the best leads at a firm that sells resort properties.

title: Marco Polo: One Hundred Eyes
synopsis: A defiant warrior-monk arrives at Kublai Khan's court in chains and soon earns his tragic nickname in this 30-minute origin story.

title: The Hateful Eight
synopsis: Years after the Civil War, a bounty hunter and his captive are waylaid by a Wyoming blizzard and hole up in a way station with six dicey strangers.

title: Mobile Suit Gundam III: Encounters in Space
synopsis: With the conflict's end in sight, the Earth Federation prepares to take the war into the Duchy of Zeon's home territory. Gundam pilot Amuro Ray, now a seasoned veteran, returns to space for the final battle.

title: A Christmas Special: Miraculous: Tales of Ladybug and Cat Noir
synopsis: Parisian teen Marinette transforms herself into superhero Ladybug to find her lonely secret crush Adrien when he runs away from home at Christmas.

title: The Guv'nor
synopsis: Lenny McLean rose from London's East End to be a revered fighter and author. His son’s personal journey looks at what made the troubled man tick.

title: Budhia Singh: Born to Run
synopsis: Born into poverty and sold by his mother to a street vendor, a 5-year-old boy becomes India's first marathon-running champion despite his youth.

title: Kabhi Haan Kabhi Naa
synopsis: A complicated love triangle develops when happy-go-lucky Sunil falls for his lovely bandmate Anna, but she's only got eyes for the wealthy Chris.

title: Oh, Hello On Broadway
synopsis: Two delusional geriatrics reveal curious pasts, share a love of tuna and welcome a surprise guest in this filming of the popular Broadway comedy show.

title: Chinese Odyssey (Part I), A
synopsis: When the Goddess of Happiness tosses the Longevity Monk and his disciples out of heaven (because the Monkey King tried to attain immortality), the Monkey King is reincarnated as the Joker. He now spends his time chasing two jealous women.

title: Sanju
synopsis: From the depths of addiction to the heights of stardom to underworld entanglements, this biopic traces the checkered past of Indian actor Sanjay Dutt.

title: Hamid
synopsis: Wanting his missing father to come home, a Kashmiri boy repeatedly attempts to call God for help -- until one day, a hardened army officer picks up.

title: You've Got This
synopsis: An ad creative and a successful exec have a great marriage — until he wants to be a dad just as her star is rising. Then he brings someone new home.

title: Classmates Minus
synopsis: Four school buddies — a director, a temp worker, an insurance salesman and a paper craftsman — grapple with unfulfilled dreams amid middle age ennui.

title: Brother Outsider: The Life of Bayard Rustin
synopsis: This inspiring documentary chronicles the life of openly gay civil rights activist Bayard Rustin, best known for organizing the 1963 March on Washington.

title: 3:10 to Yuma
synopsis: In this remake of the 1957 classic, a rancher agrees to transport a captured outlaw to the nearest rail station, where they'll board a train to court.

title: Boyz n the Hood
synopsis: A South Central Los Angeles high schooler struggles to please his father and to stay straight in a community polluted by drugs, violence and racism.

title: Beasts of No Nation
synopsis: When civil war tears his family apart, a young West African boy is forced to join a unit of mercenary fighters and transform into a child soldier.

title: Jim Jefferies: Freedumb
synopsis: Returning for a second Netflix comedy special, Jim Jefferies unleashes his famously ferocious black humor to a packed house in Nashville, Tennessee.

title: Pyaar Ka Punchnama
synopsis: Being single is a way of life for bachelor roommates Rajat, Nishant and Vikrant -- until each one falls in love, thrice opening the door to chaos.

title: Madras Café
synopsis: An Indian intelligence agent journeys to a war-torn coastal island to break a resolute rebel group and meets a passionate journalist.

title: Jim and Andy: The Great Beyond - Featuring a Very Special, Contractually Obligated Mention of Tony Clifton
synopsis: Through the lens of his stunningly immersive performance as Andy Kaufman, Jim Carrey ponders the meaning of life, reality, identity and career.

title: Guru
synopsis: Ambitious Gurukant Desai ignores his father's advice and leaves his village to find success in Turkey.

title: Maktub
synopsis: After surviving a bomb attack, two low-level mobsters in Jerusalem change their ways and set about making strangers' Wailing Wall prayers come true.

title: The Bleeding Edge
synopsis: This eye-opening look at the fast-growing medical device industry reveals how the rush to innovate can lead to devastating consequences for patients.

title: Mersal
synopsis: A detective arrests a doctor for crimes targeting medical professionals but later finds the real culprit in a tale of revenge, corruption and magic.

title: ROMA
synopsis: Director Alfonso Cuarón delivers a vivid, emotional portrait of domestic life and social hierarchy set against Mexico's political turmoil of the 1970s.

title: Brené Brown: The Call to Courage
synopsis: With humor and empathy, Brené Brown discusses what it takes to choose courage over comfort in a culture defined by scarcity, fear and uncertainty.

title: Rolling Thunder Revue: A Bob Dylan Story by Martin Scorsese
synopsis: In an alchemic mix of fact and fantasy, Martin Scorsese looks back at Bob Dylan's 1975 Rolling Thunder Revue tour and a country ripe for reinvention.

title: Elena
synopsis: In this documentary, the director remembers a sister who left behind her life under Brazil’s dictatorship and moved to New York with dreams of acting.

title: Tell Me Who I Am
synopsis: In this documentary, Alex trusts his twin, Marcus, to tell him about his past after he loses his memory. But Marcus is hiding a dark family secret.

title: A Sun
synopsis: A family reckons with the aftermath of their younger son's incarceration and a greater misfortune that follows.

title: ROAD TO ROMA
synopsis: Director Alfonso Cuarón reflects on the childhood memories, period details and creative choices that shaped his Academy Award-winning film 'ROMA.'

title: Agneepath
synopsis: A boy grows up to become a gangster in pursuit of the mobster who killed his innocent father, but revenge and reparation may come at great costs.

title: ROAD TO NINJA: NARUTO THE MOVIE
synopsis: The Masked Man sends Naruto and Sakura to an alternate reality where his parents are alive and hers are dead. Somehow they've got to get back.

title: Material
synopsis: A dutiful son must hide his pursuit of stand-up comedy from his staunch father, who expects him to inherit his store and uphold their Muslim beliefs.

title: Cops and Robbers
synopsis: Animation and activism unite in this multimedia spoken-word response to police brutality and racial injustice.

title: Little Big Women
synopsis: A family grapples with the passing of their estranged father and the remnants of the life he led during his absence.

title: Wild Dog
synopsis: A brash but brilliant Indian intelligence agent leads a covert operation to nab the mastermind behind a series of attacks threatening national security.

title: Wild Dog
synopsis: A brash but brilliant Indian intelligence agent leads a covert operation to nab the mastermind behind a series of attacks threatening national security.

title: Wild Dog
synopsis: A brash but brilliant Indian intelligence agent leads a covert operation to nab the mastermind behind a series of attacks threatening national security.

title: Wild Dog
synopsis: A brash but brilliant Indian intelligence agent leads a covert operation to nab the mastermind behind a series of attacks threatening national security.

title: The Grown-Ups
synopsis: At a work-study school for those with Down Syndrome, students in their 40s dream of independence and marriage despite low pay and their families' wishes.

title: Eega
synopsis: A murdered man reborn as a housefly seeks revenge on the jealous businessman who killed him — and a chance to reunite with the love of his life.

title: Oohalu Gusagusalade
synopsis: When given a bizarre opportunity to get the job of his dreams, an aspiring TV news anchor must decide between his career and the love of his life.

title: The Powerpuff Girls Rule!!!
synopsis: Blossom, Bubbles, Buttercup and all the villains of Townsville get swept up in a competition to control a magic key that will let them rule the world.

title: American Psycho
synopsis: With chiseled good looks that belie his insanity, a businessman takes pathological pride in yuppie pursuits and indulges in sudden homicidal urges.

title: The Butterfly Effect
synopsis: In this thriller, college student Evan Treborn, who's besieged by tragic memories, discovers a way to alter his past. But will it make a difference?

title: Bigger, Stronger, Faster
synopsis: Filmmaker Chris Bell points the camera at his brothers and himself -- all steroid users -- for this provocative examination of sports and competition.

title: What Happened, Miss Simone?
synopsis: Using never-before-heard recordings, rare archival footage and her best-known songs, this is the story of legendary singer and activist Nina Simone.

title: Zombieland
synopsis: Looking to survive in a world taken over by zombies, a dorky college student teams with an urban roughneck and a pair of grifter sisters.

title: Superbad
synopsis: Two best friends' quest to buy booze for a party in the hopes of scoring with girls leads them on a series of wacky misadventures.

title: Vera Drake
synopsis: Vera Drake spends her days doting on her working-class family. But Vera also has a secret side: She visits women and helps them induce miscarriages.

title: Rurouni Kenshin: The Legend Ends
synopsis: Kenshin trains with his master to learn the final techniques he needs to stop Shishio from taking down the government and plunging Japan into chaos.

title: Rurouni Kenshin: Kyoto Inferno
synopsis: Warrior turned pacifist Kenshin Himura reluctantly takes on a vile assassin scheming to topple the Meiji government with help from some hired killers.

title: 5 Centimeters Per Second
synopsis: Inseparable fourth-graders Takaki Tonoo and Akari Shinohara -- bonded by a love of books -- begin to slowly drift apart when their families relocate.

title: Fury
synopsis: A green recruit experiences the horror of war with a veteran American tank crew during the vicious combat of World War II's waning days.

title: Tickled
synopsis: While looking into the 'sport' of competitive tickling, reporter David Farrier uncovers a dark empire that ensnares and exploits vulnerable young men.

title: Dear Zindagi
synopsis: Accustomed to living an unfocused life, a promising cinematographer meets an unconventional therapist who introduces her to a new way of thinking.

title: The Last: Naruto the Movie
synopsis: Two years after the Fourth Shinobi World War, the fate of mankind is placed in Naruto's hands when the moon threatens a collision course with Earth.

title: Tom Segura: Disgraceful
synopsis: Tom Segura gives voice to the sordid thoughts you'd never say out loud, with blunt musings on porn, parking lot power struggles, parenthood and more.

title: Dil Se
synopsis: A radio broadcaster's intense attraction to a mysterious woman opens the door to a tidal wave of powerful emotions and desires.

title: Bad Genius
synopsis: A top student gets pulled into a cheating racket with increasingly higher risks and even higher rewards. But she may lose much more than she gains.

title: One Piece Film: Strong World
synopsis: Legendary pirate Shiki reappears in East Blue planning to destroy the World Government. When he kidnaps Nami, the Straw Hats confront a strange land.

title: Quincy
synopsis: This documentary profiles music and culture icon Quincy Jones, offering unprecedented access to his private life and stories from his unparalleled career.

title: Jodhaa Akbar
synopsis: In 16th-century India, what begins as a strategic alliance between a Mughal emperor and a Hindu princess becomes a genuine opportunity for true love.

title: Wake Up Sid
synopsis: A spoiled trust fund brat finds himself stuck in a rut of meaningless late-night parties -- until he meets a significantly older woman and writer.

title: Baby Driver
synopsis: Smooth-faced getaway driver Baby is a music junkie in deep with a bad dude. He's got just one job left, but it's all about to go sideways.

title: Do Dooni Chaar
synopsis: A struggling math teacher holds down a second job to keep his family afloat. But when he receives a wedding invitation, he's determined to attend.

title: Happy as Lazzaro
synopsis: Purehearted teen Lazzaro is content living as a sharecropper in rural Italy, but an unlikely friendship with the marquise's son will change his world.

title: Ayotzinapa, el paso de la tortuga
synopsis: Delving into the disappearance of 43 college students in Mexico, this documentary seeks to give justice and a voice to the victims and their families.

title: Power Paandi
synopsis: Retired, restless and constantly butting heads with his son, a former stuntman escapes on a road trip that becomes a journey to find his first love.

title: A Twelve Year Night
synopsis: Future Uruguayan president José Mujica and his fellow Tupamaro political prisoners fight to survive 12 years of solitary confinement and torture.

title: The Boy Who Harnessed the Wind
synopsis: Inspired by a science book, 13-year-old William Kamkwamba builds a wind turbine to save his Malawian village from famine. Based on a true story.

title: Burning
synopsis: An aspiring writer goes to the airport to pick up a high school friend returning from a trip to Africa but is disheartened to see her with another man.

title: My Hero Academia: Two Heroes
synopsis: With Deku, All Might visits an old friend on the technologically advanced I-Island, when a gang of villains takes the whole city hostage.

title: The Crystal Calls Making the Dark Crystal: Age of Resistance
synopsis: Go behind the scenes with stars, puppeteers and creators as they bring Jim Henson's magical world of Thra back to life in a sweeping fantasy series.

title: I Lost My Body
synopsis: Romance, mystery and adventure intertwine as a young man falls in love and a severed hand scours Paris for its owner in this mesmerizing animated film.

title: The Two Popes
synopsis: At a key turning point for the Catholic Church, Pope Benedict XVI forms a surprising friendship with the future Pope Francis. Inspired by true events.

title: Aruna and Her Palate
synopsis: An epidemiologist turns her nationwide bird flu investigation into a chance to sample local delicacies en route, with three friends along for the ride.

title: Magnificent
synopsis: An industrialist's daughter is forced to marry a rich heir by her greedy grandmother as her adopted sister bonds with the charismatic wedding planner.

title: PhotoCopy
synopsis: Posing as her bubbly identical twin for a quiz contest, a shy student crushes on a fellow participant, who falls for her — thinking she’s her sister.

title: High & Low The Movie
synopsis: The five rival gangs ruling the SWORD district unite to face off against a 500-member strong attack led by a legendary gang leader.

title: High & Low The Movie 2 / End of Sky
synopsis: The peaceful truce in the SWORD district is violently disrupted by the intrusion of two brutal gangs, causing loyalties and rivalries to erupt.

title: High & Low The Movie 3 / Final Mission
synopsis: The Kuryu Group makes it their mission to takeover the SWORD district once and for all, but the street gang alliance has a plan of their own.

title: High & Low The Worst
synopsis: The street fighters of Oya High go up against the delinquent brawlers of Housen Academy in this action-packed “High & Low” and “Crows” crossover.

title: The Mole Agent
synopsis: A widower in his 80s is hired by a private investigator to infiltrate a nursing home and find out if its caretakers are committing elder abuse.

title: Excuse My French
synopsis: Assumed to be Muslim like many of his new public school peers, a young boy goes along with the misunderstanding, hoping to blend in with the crowd.

title: The Birds
synopsis: In Alfred Hitchcock's classic tale of feathered terror, a socialite's visit to a coastal town coincides with sudden attacks by flocks of homicidal birds.

title: Ahead of the Curve
synopsis: Curve magazine and its dynamic founder come alive in a documentary tracing the publication from its '90s lesbian roots to its ongoing LGBTQ+ journey.
